Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Austin-Mason
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madsion, Austin, Washington and Central due to street blockage near Madison/Austin-Mason.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madsion, Austin, Washington and Central due to street blockage near Madison/Austin-Mason.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
